DzDctVertex Class Reference
[Object and Geometry Classes]

Represents a vertex that has discontinuous data in a vertex map. This class implemented 'explicitly shared' data for for the discontinuous vertex. This means that copying, or assignment operations are very efficient. This also means that all copies of a data item reference the same data, if one is changed, they are all changed. The method deepCopy creates and returns a deep copy of the dctVertex that does not share the same data. More...

#include <dzvertexmap.h>

Detailed Description

Represents a vertex that has discontinuous data in a vertex map. This class implemented 'explicitly shared' data for for the discontinuous vertex. This means that copying, or assignment operations are very efficient. This also means that all copies of a data item reference the same data, if one is changed, they are all changed. The method deepCopy creates and returns a deep copy of the dctVertex that does not share the same data.

DzDctVertex::DzDctVertex ( const DzDctVertex &  vert  ) 

Copy Constructor. This is very efficient since the actual data is 'explicitly shared'. All copies of an item reference the same actual data.

Assignment Operator. This is very efficient since the actual data is 'explicitly shared'. All copies of an item reference the same actual data.

void DzDctVertex::setFacetMapIdx ( int  facetIdx,
int  mapIdx 
)

Sets the discontinuous data for the facet at the given index. Calling this function does nothing if this item is 'invalid'.

Parameters:
facetIdx The index of the facet to set the discontinuous map index for.
mapIdx The index of the map item that this facet vertex will use.
void DzDctVertex::setIndex ( int  vertIdx  ) 

Sets the index of the vertex that this discontinuous data item is for. Calling this method will make an 'invalid' data item 'valid'.

Parameters:
vertIdx The index of the vertex this item is for.
